LanguageData.SMN_AutoDoorOpenDescription: Open remotely via a SkyMind connection.
LanguageData.SMN_AutoDoorCloseDescription: Close remotely via a SkyMind connection.
LanguageData.SMN_OpenRemoteCommsDesc: Open communications remotely via a SkyMind connection.
LanguageData.SMN_ServerNetworkConnectionNeeded: Server not connected to SkyMind network.
LanguageData.SMN_SkillModeDesc: This server is assigned to skill point generation. Click to switch to security.
LanguageData.SMN_SecurityModeDesc: This server is assigned to security point generation. Click to switch to hacking.
LanguageData.SMN_HackingModeDesc: This server is assigned to hacking point generation. Click to switch to skill.
LanguageData.SMN_HackingWindowDesc: Open the hacking interface, allowing for the usage of hacking points to engage in nefarious activity.
LanguageData.SMN_SwitchToSkillModeDesc: This server is in an illegal state. Click to switch to skill.
LanguageData.SMN_ConnectSkyMindDesc: Connect this device to the SkyMind network for remote interaction.
LanguageData.SMN_RemoveCloudPawnConfirm: Flushing {0} from the SkyMind network will permanently destroy the intelligence. This is considered murder.
LanguageData.SMN_SkillsDesc: Open skill workshop, allowing exchange of server skill points for experience and passions.
LanguageData.SMN_ControlSurrogateDesc: Take control of the selected hostless surrogate.
LanguageData.SMN_DisconnectCloudPawnDesc: Disconnect a SkyMind consciousness from its surrogates.
LanguageData.SMN_ControlCaravanSurrogateDesc: Recover a hostless surrogate in a caravan.
LanguageData.SMN_DownloadCloudPawnDesc: Download a SkyMind intelligence into this pawn.
LanguageData.SMN_DownloadCloudPawnConfirm: This operation fully transfers a SkyMind intelligence into this pawn. The intelligence will not persist in the network.
LanguageData.SMN_ToggleControlModeDesc: Toggle surrogate control mode, allowing for surrogate controls but disabling SkyMind operations.
LanguageData.SMN_PermuteDesc: Permute the consciousness of the currently selected colonist with another colonist.
LanguageData.SMN_PermuteConfirm: This operation will swap the intelligences of {0} and {1}.
LanguageData.SMN_TransferDesc: Transfer the consciousness of the currently selected colonist into an organic surrogate.
LanguageData.SMN_TransferConfirm: This operation will transfer {0} into the target surrogate's body. This will leave {0}'s original body mindless. The SkyMind receiver will burn out once the operation is complete.
LanguageData.SMN_UploadDesc: Upload this intelligence to the SkyMind network. What happens to the left-behind body is controlled via settings (default is body becomes braindead).
LanguageData.SMN_UploadConfirm: This operation transfers this intelligence into the SkyMind network, leaving the body behind.
LanguageData.SMN_DetonateIEDRemotelyDesc: Trigger the IED remotely and instantly via a SkyMind connection.
